text: Kare wa, anata gata jishin (no keiken) kara, hitotsu no tatoe o teiji nasa reru. Anata gata wa, jibun no migite no shoyu suru mono-tachi (dorei) o, ware ga anata gata ni ataeta mono o doto ni bunpai suru nakama ni surudarou ka. Anata gataga tagaini kidzukau yo ni, kare-ra (dorei-tachi) ni kigane surudarou ka. (Sode waarumai). Ko no yo ni ware wa, shiryo aru mono ni shirushi o tokiakasu
